entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
